UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: AmAMP1 from Acropora millepora and damicornin define a family of coral-specific antimicrobial peptides related to the Shk toxins of sea anemones.
Literature.Author: Mason B, Cooke I, Moya A, Augustin R, Lin MF, Satoh N, Bosch TCG, Bourne DG, Hayward DC, Andrade N, Forêt S, Ying H, Ball EE, Miller DJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K12 MG1655(MIC=23.5µM),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 14581(MIC=0.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=47µM),Bacillus megaterium CNJ778(MIC=0.05µM),Bacillus megaterium CNJ778(MIC=0.18µM),Exiguobacterium aestuarii CNJ771(no activity data),Exiguobacterium aestuarii CNJ771(MIC=0.7µM),Bacillus algicola CNJ803(no activity data),Bacillus algicola CNJ803(MIC=0.09µM),Acinetobacter sp.(MIC=1.5µM),Acinetobacter sp.(MIC=11.7µM),Vibrio coralliilyticus(MIC=94µM),Vibrio coralliilyticus(MIC=>94µM),Aliivibrio fischeri ES114(MIC=5.9µM),Aliivibrio fischeri ES114(MIC=11.7µM)
